name: Razer Naga Epic Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: [17 Fully-programmable MMO-optimized buttons (including 12 button thumb grid), Wired / Wireless dual mode capability, Wireless: USB 2.4ghz dongle (with wired-mode connector port), 3 Interchangeable side panels, Charging dock (also functions as a wireless receiver unit), Unlimited character profiles with AddOns, Optional MMO-specific software AddOns, 16 million color backlight illumination, 5600dpi Razer Precision 3.5G Laser Sensor, 1000Hz Ultrapolling / 1ms response time, Battery Life: 12hrs (continuous use); 72 hours (normal gaming usage)]
